command.name: Search datasets
command.description: Retrieves datasets from a select filter.

parameter.name: agencies
parameter.description: To filter on agencies, give the list of agencies id.

parameter.name: fileformats
parameter.description: To filter on files format, give the list of formats id or a list of formats name.

parameter.name: licences
parameter.description: To filter on licences, give the list of licences id.

parameter.name: released
parameter.description: To retrieve datasets from a published date. Date format is aaaa-mm-dd. Example : 2010-06-25.

parameter.name: updated
parameter.description: To retrieve datasets from a updated date. Date format is aaaa-mm-dd. Example : 2010-06-25.

parameter.name: limit
parameter.description: Number of results by page. If not set, one page without limit is returned.

parameter.name: page
parameter.description: Page's number to get results. If limit is set, default is first page.
